website_summaries.verdict: The top-of-the-line 15-inch MacBook Pro is now slimmer and more capable, and comes equipped with Apple's new Touch Bar. It's a laptop with the speed, storage, and size that traveling power users crave. Just get ready to buy some dongles.
pros: Bright display with wide (DCI-P3) color gamut

website_summaries.verdict: Although the fifth-generation Intel Core i5 processor and Force Touch trackpad are minor updates, this year's 13-inch Retina Apple MacBook Pro is still an easy top pick for high-end ultraportables.
pros: More than 11 hours of battery life in our tests
Brilliant Retina display with higher-than-1080p resolution
Comes with iLife and iWork software suites
cons: Only upgradable at time of order
Base Flash Storage capacity is just 128GB
Force Touch trackpad takes a little getting used to, and is of limited use right now

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Apple laptop especially for this price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great laptop. Ok, it's not the latest model. It doesn't have the touchbar and touch ID. But it's a lot cheaper. It has a fantastic display, a good keyboard and is fast enough for most people. I bought the base model with 128GB storage. I'm not sure this will be enough but if not, I will get an external drive. I mostly use cloud storage for important documents anyway.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Fast enough for my purposes, very light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer instead of the newer 2016 model because I HATE that apple took away USB ports from its laptops (how dumb). I'm very pleased with my purchase. The retina screen is great, my laptop is very fast and very light. I use the laptop to create podcasts, and it gets the job done very nicely. I actually thought I was buying the 15" monitor, but was happy that I ended up with the smaller version instead because I hate lugging around the heavier 15" anyway. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Delighted! Awesome laptop and justifiably still impacting on sales of the new MacBook Pro!
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome product! Great battery life and all round performance. Really don't see the need to purchase new MB Pro with the annoyance of no USB ports or SD card reader just yet, all the attachments/adapters make it a real annoyance for the next year or two before this is the normal in the industry. Delighted with this product - the only small thing I would change is buy a bigger hard driver next time - 128gb may end up being a bit of a squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Device
customer_reviews.text: Had this laptop for two years now. Honestly it has helped me BIG TIME at uni. I love the screen quality, the navigation, trackpad, keyboard... I am very pleased. Sadly the keyboard packed in a month ago but a repair wasn't too expensive. Apart from that no problems and i continue to use the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Once you go Mac, you'll never go back!
customer_reviews.text: Quite simply, the best laptop I've ever owned! Apple have impressed with a fantastic device that runs faultlessly time after time. The MacBook is packed with performance power and style, a perfect combination to create an industry leading device. As they say, you get what you pay for and the MacBook is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Iles

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love my Mac! I wish I had bought a Mac with a larger screen but apart from that, it's beautiful. It's ultra light weight and slim and the accessories are easy to port. It keeps it's charge for a few days even with daily use, however it's hard to define volume of use for every user. I want one of these in every room - love it!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Robinson-Aberdeen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Seller - Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product - I would recommend this laptop and seller 100%. Delivered in great condition and easy to set up and use straight away. I am an Apple Convert.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sons college work .I was not an Apple person but now im converted. I know they cost more but well worth it. The same goes for the phones....Well Worth the Money Spent .... Excellent
customer_reviews.author: Mr C Short

customer_reviews.title: Apple of my eye!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly and appears to be in as new condition. Sellers kindly upgraded to 512 he and all latest software installed. Am extremely pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: N S

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is my first macbook, I have mac mini also. Great battery life, I can easily get 6-7 hours of battery. Great screen, very sharp, colors look amazing. Great touchpad, this force touch technology is superb. Overall I'm really happy, I was waiting for the new macbooks, but when they came out, I've decided this laptop is not much different from the new 2016 macbook 13". More i/o and basically the same form factor and only 100 grams heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant lap top
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant lap top. Very very light and very fast. Come on very quickly and a must for people who travel a lot or work from different sites through the day
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Great price, excellent laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Laptop came earlier than expected, which I thought was lovely. Also came with 2011 Microsoft Office which was a nice addition. With regards to the physical attributes of the laptop, it looked new and was packaged really well for delivery- I was very impressed. Initially I thought I was being scammed as the price seemed too good to be true but the seller was really responsive and reassuring. Additionally, the seller I bought it from included 12 month free warranty. There were some minor blemishes on the laptop of which I’ve included pictures of but they’re not too noticeable. All in all, I’m incredibly happy with my purchase and am in love with my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: T.F.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant apple product
customer_reviews.text: I love my MacBook and don't know what I would do without it. Great price on amazon as well, not looking forward to the day when I have to upgrade it.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe G

customer_reviews.title: Its a Mac
customer_reviews.text: No problems so far. Will never go back to a windows computer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Simply the Best.
customer_reviews.text: If it were possible I give it even more stars. I found my 15" MBP. a bit heavy when travelling abroad. This has the best Wifi connectivity on any computer that I have. So should be great in Spain, for picking up the signal from our friendly coffee bar.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to fault
customer_reviews.text: I dident want to write the feedback too early and jump to the positives but I should of ! The macbook is amazing , in great condition well looked after and basicallly brand new! Extremely happy with the purchase ! If in future you have any other products that I would be interested in buying I will sure do . Exactly as you described . Amazing machine , also thank you for the extra case for the Mac .
customer_reviews.author: bartosz szczygiel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing computer. Really, really good. Bought for uni and although it cost the best part of a grand I don't regret it. For anyone looking to buy it today, Apple have a WWDC tomorrow and they are set to announce a new model. This will probably be priced at the same as this one, and this will drop by £100 so wait it out!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Great Mac, love it, its fast and talks to all my other Apple stuff, it all just plays together so well. Plus when Windows is required I have a window smini server with RDP enabled, and RDP installed on the Mac. Not cheap but lovely quality
customer_reviews.author: Labowski

customer_reviews.title: Quick reliable great quality item
customer_reviews.text: Bought secondhand this laptop appeared to be NEW. Not a mark anywhere. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cromwell2014

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING machine delivered early, very well packed with all the bits it suppose to have well happy.
customer_reviews.author: G. D. Waters

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest place selling them.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good laptop at a good price, it requires an in-depth review and I'm just not going to give that. This was the cheapest place I could find a new one of these so I would recommend getting it if you're thinking about it.
customer_reviews.author: T. ROWE

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my new Macbook. Glad I found a 2015 model on here. Everything arrived in working order and looking beautiful. I only noticed a small nick on the outside after careful inspection, other than that it's like new. Just had to email seller for the log in password!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: he loves it and swears its better than anything else
customer_reviews.text: got this for son's 18th...he loves it and swears its better than anything else....no loss of speed, no risk of virus. then again, my £200 chromebook does the same job, and is also brushed aluminium!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I use it all the time and haven’t had any problems except of its inability to run most games

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome piece of kit. The mac is so quiet compared to other laptops ive had, and there isnt any software I need to buy for it as it comes all preloaded with all the software I need. I bought it to edit photos and videos and it does the job with ease
customer_reviews.author: Tony Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable laptop
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and she loves it! A little late with the review but three years down the line & it's still in brilliant working order! Has never let her down & she's used it all through university.
customer_reviews.author: Nagamama!!

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Laptop, fast and reliable, although quite expsensive I haighly recommend this.

customer_reviews.title: Such a disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: Mine is a ZP/A version though I have emailed the seller for its originality and they claimed that it is a UK version with the legit UK keyboard. I still had to keep it anyway since my old one is broken and I need another for work immediately. Such a disappointment!

customer_reviews.title: very happy and at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Got my item on time and the seller replied to ever message I sent, very happy and at a good price

customer_reviews.title: finally bought it and I am in love. I've never had any Apple computer before
customer_reviews.text: After saving up for this laptop for ages, finally bought it and I am in love. I've never had any Apple computer before, always been a Windows user, but this laptop has made me love apple products even more. Only thing to look out for now is how long it'll hold up.

customer_reviews.text: This is a good laptop, I bought because I need to change from desktop to laptop. It is perfect. Arrived before of estimate delivery and in good condition.

customer_reviews.text: this is my third purchase of this item for my family members well pleased

customer_reviews.text: very happy, nothing can go wrong with apple products. was delivered quickly, no problems, seller was very responsive when i needed an invoice.

customer_reviews.text: Great product. Delivered as mentioned - Uk version. Love it!!

customer_reviews.title: Best money ever spent
customer_reviews.text: I am still getting used to Mac rather than windows, however, it is fab. Best money ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: Jan D

customer_reviews.title: It is an amazing product, light
customer_reviews.text: It is an amazing product, light, fast and top of the range! However one drawback is it not having a cd drive built in which does make it lighter however, it is needed and to buy an external device can cost up to 60 pounds! Also i recieved the version with an international keyboard which was fine with as emailed the seller and they only told me ithey shipped the macbook with it but the only thing different is that there is no pound sign. All in all a fantastic product and i have no regrets about buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Artymony

customer_reviews.title: bought this after using a friends and I am happy to say I will never go back to windows
customer_reviews.text: always said I would never have an apple. bought this after using a friends and I am happy to say I will never go back to windows. takes some time getting used to but once you get the hand of it, it is so much better. Use this for work and it is amazing. Battery is great, boot up takes seconds.
customer_reviews.author: sarcalogos_

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop on the market to date
customer_reviews.text: Shame about the Brexit price rise, but this computer is worth every penny. I was a life long user of PC, but after getting this laptop for university, I don't think I will be switching back. The retina screen is out of this world, and the trackpad is so natural to use, I now find using a mouse weird.
customer_reviews.author: Egan95

customer_reviews.title: First time Mac - not dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ever Mac and I'm very impressed. It does take a bit of getting used to, but after only a few days I was looking into buying an iMac. It works brilliantly and am yet to find any negatives so far. Mine came with a US keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: PopPops

customer_reviews.title: MacBook Pro truly "awesomely brilliant" get one!!
customer_reviews.text: Best MacBook Pro I've ever owned it just does what I want it to do, solid build, fastest graphics powerhouse, boots up just under a second just wonderful get straight into what I've left doing. Apple do create amazing products...
customer_reviews.author: rhysroderick

customer_reviews.title: Insane
customer_reviews.text: The best thing I have ever bought. Ever. I bought this for using as a base for my DJ career. It's capable of this and yet so much more. This machine is simply insane. Thank you Amazon & my seller - fast delivery, no problems. Just so incredible to use. Would recommend to absolutely anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good all round laptop
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for a month or so now and I love it. I also have a Microsoft Surface and I love it too but this is a better daily driver. It is powerful enough to run most Indie steam games and do programming work with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: brim

customer_reviews.title: A quality product
customer_reviews.text: Having always bought budget laptops, I decided to invest in something quite light, but reasonably powerful. It was a toss-up between this and the Dell XPS-13 and to be honest I went for this because it could be delivered next day! I'm really enjoying it and have found it easy to get used to using a Mac and US keyboard, which isn't very different. It wasn't the lightest I was looking at, but I find it very comfortable to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Windows!
customer_reviews.text: I've always been hesitant in spending so much money on a laptop but I'm so glad I did. After horrendous experiences with Windows computers waiting hours for software updates to install only for them to fail I am so pleased that I've finally invested. Having had Apple iPhones for a few years now I am aware that their updates and bug fixes for iOS software are usually sorted out very quickly and I can say exactly the same for the software on this laptop. The laptop is fast, the display is great and to my surprise the speaker sound quality was better than any laptop I've ever had! I just wish I'd made the switch from Windows to Apple sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Elspeth

customer_reviews.title: Useful Tip
customer_reviews.text: Perfect but make sure you don't buy off 'Amazon Market Place' if you want the UK spec keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good piece of kit but expected something very special and it is not quite that.
customer_reviews.author: Norm Batchelor

customer_reviews.title: Poor service, trading on the name.
customer_reviews.text: Great if you have a device that works properly. I've had mine less than 6 months and Apple Care has to be one of the worst customer service providers going. Be prepared to be on hold waiting for someone to answer for at least 45 minutes each time you call, to wait in line despite having booked an appointment at their ironically termed "Genius" bar, then to lose your laptop for a whopping 2 weeks with no replacement, only to discover they haven't fixed the problem and its your responsibility to book another appointment and go through the whole process again. No exchanges offered. You've been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: what else can you say about Apple the best there is
customer_reviews.text: MacBook pro , what else can you say about Apple the best there is !!!!
customer_reviews.author: JAMES

customer_reviews.title: but this was an issue with the software on the Mac itself and quickly and easily resolved by contacting apple support who are fa
customer_reviews.text: Amazon delivered my product as described. I had a couple of issues with it relating to the software and setting up all the connectivity, but this was an issue with the software on the Mac itself and quickly and easily resolved by contacting apple support who are fantastic. This was my PC to Mac switch moment and I really don't think I can go back to PC"s. My Mac Pro is fast to use and totally worth paying 100 quid extra and getting a Pro rather than an Air (which are significantly lower spec) Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful laptop.all packaged nicely prompt delivery Thank you! Good value for money and its a british key board! Thankyou :-)

customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect. Arrived far sooner than the scheduled delivery time. Used but in perfect condition and boxed well with all accessories. customer_reviews.text: Great laptop, I was unsure as this is my first time owning a mac and can safely say that I made the right decision. I have a powerful windows desktop for gaming and bought this for work/design and haven't been disappointed. Impressed by the build quality which feels solid and built to last, everything is fast and intuitive and I have yet to find fault with this beautiful machine.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: I Love It
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the macbook. It is top of the range. Very fast and easy to use. It is a perfect size aswell. I can take it anywhere with me and the battery life is amazing. I do not have to worry about sitting somewhere near a plug because the battery last for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Nata
